name: The Stars May Be
description:
The Stars May Be is a horror metroidvania with an overworld (or, overspace!) map with multiple stations to explore.

The goal of the game is to repair your warp drive and head home after waking up from a massive battle.

Two modes of gameplay, space and station exploration. Controls explained in game in the "How To Play" section

Explore the space map to find station that may contain key items to repair your ship. Avoid space horrors, stars and black holes. Find upgrades scattered around space for your ship. Carefully traverse derelict space stations where horrors could lurk around any corner. Find upgrades for your suit to progress and survive!
